name: Slime Crime (No whOne, Pazzi)
description:
Note: If the glitch effect and screen shake gets out of hand, you can turn them off in the settings.

𝗢𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗲𝘄:

This is a wave survival roguelike game where you play as a slime, and kill enemies to harvest their bodies for experience. Level up and unlock new skills overtime, while the enemies get progressively harder. This game was made for Ludum Dare 52 (Harvest) in 72 hours.

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗹𝘀:

WASD       - Move

Left click - Shoot

E          - Harvest corpse

𝗢𝗯𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲:

Survive the wave of enemies, while also shooting them down and harvesting them. Be careful, however, as you can only do one thing at a time: Move, Shoot, or Harvest. Harvest enemies to gain XP and unlock new skills to beat even harder enemies... Harvest the body of the Red Skeleton in order to win.

𝗖𝗿𝗲𝗱𝗶𝘁𝘀:

Programming - No whOne

Art         - Pazzi (Mostly), No whOne (Partially)

Music       - Pazzi

Sound fx    - No whOne, using sounds from freesound.org and jsfxr
